channel.title: CVE Feed for Motorola -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Motorola -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-23629|2024-01-25T23:41:29.663Z -- Motorola -- MR2600
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the web component of the Motorola MR2600. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to access protected URLs and retrieve sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-23628|2024-01-25T23:41:27.462Z -- Motorola -- MR2600
item.description: A command injection vulnerability exists in the 'SaveStaticRouteIPv6Params' parameter of the Motorola MR2600. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to achieve command execution. Authentication is required, however can be bypassed.

item.title: CVE-2024-23627|2024-01-25T23:41:25.037Z -- Motorola -- MR2600
item.description: A command injection vulnerability exists in the 'SaveStaticRouteIPv4Params' parameter of the Motorola MR2600. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to achieve command execution. Authentication is required, however can be bypassed.

item.title: CVE-2024-23630|2024-01-25T23:41:32.024Z -- Motorola -- MR2600
item.description: An arbitrary firmware upload vulnerability exists in the Motorola MR2600. An attacker can exploit this vulnerability to achieve code execution on the device. Authentication is required, however can be bypassed.

item.title: CVE-2024-23626|2024-01-25T23:41:22.774Z -- Motorola -- MR2600
item.description: A command injection vulnerability exists in the ‘SaveSysLogParams’ parameter of the Motorola MR2600. A remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to achieve command execution. Authentication is required, however can be bypassed.

item.title: CVE-2024-3479|2024-05-03T14:10:07.470Z -- Motorola -- Phones
item.description: An improper export vulnerability was reported in the Motorola Enterprise MotoDpms Provider (com.motorola.server.enterprise.MotoDpmsProvider) that could allow a local attacker to read local data.

item.title: CVE-2024-3480|2024-05-03T14:10:15.549Z -- Motorola -- Phones
item.description: An Implicit intent vulnerability was reported in the Motorola framework that could allow an attacker to read telephony-related data.

item.title: CVE-2024-3109|2024-05-03T14:09:59.372Z -- Motorola -- Phones
item.description: A hard-coded AES key vulnerability was reported in the Motorola GuideMe application, along with a lack of URI sanitation, could allow for a local attacker to read arbitrary files.

item.title: CVE-2024-3108|2024-05-03T14:06:53.248Z -- Motorola -- Phones
item.description: An implicit intent vulnerability was reported for Motorola’s Time Weather Widget application that could allow a local application to acquire the location of the device without authorization.
